# Timeline {background-color="#62259D"}


## Timeline

<br>

1930s: [Post-Great Depression]{.note} economy



::: {.incremental}

- How much [unemployment]{.note}?

- [New Deal]{.note}

- [National Industrial Recovery Act](https://www.archives.gov/milestone-documents/national-industrial-recovery-act) ([NIRA]{.note}, 1933)

- [National Labor Relations Act](https://www.archives.gov/milestone-documents/national-labor-relations-act) ([NLRA]{.note}, 1935)

- [Taxes]{.note} on top earners: 79%

- End of Depression-era unemployment: [World War II]{.note}

:::
